column1: Environmental Economics and Climate Change MSc
London School of Economics and Political Science

Ask LSEThis programme aims to deliver a well-developed understanding of the economics, science and policies associated with climate change, as well as a broad foundation in environmental and resource economics. It delves into the conceptual economic foundations and the practical tools of analysis, including state-of-the-art quantitative methods.
Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
